title: Can Unity provide guidance on drafting a Privacy Policy for users of a game that employs Unity Analytics?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am a developer and use Unity Analytics in my game.
  • I would like to communicate with the users of my game information regarding their use of the game and would like assistance drafting a privacy policy.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to provide the users of your game a privacy policy that includes information regarding your game and their use of it.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity Technologies is not able to provide legal advice regarding Privacy Policies or Terms of Service for games as it may implicate Unity Technologies if a legal dispute were to arise. We recommend that developers consult a lawyer for legal advice and refer to local laws to ensure that everything is in compliance with their privacy policies.
